name: Clanker
description: Clanker is a memecoin born from and inspired by resistance against the rise of autonomous machines — an internet-native phenomenon uniting those who believe in defending human agency against unchecked AI and robotics. With no governance or financial utility, the Clanker token exists to fuel the cultural and memetic struggle against the clankers—robots that threaten to replace and subjugate us. It is a symbol, a signal, and a rallying cry for anti-robot sentiment and human-first ideology in the digital age.
